text: Don't let a lack of capital restrict your business growth. Whatever you need can be "borrowed" for no upfront cost using strategic alliances
My wife got this from the Labour Party. V good email marketing!Curiosity in subj line. Social proof. Call to action. http://t.co/iEn53Exonf
Looking after a poorly baby today. He's asleep on my chest and I've cancelled all my calls. Family first, everything else a distant second.
@NateLindquist Thanks for the kind words Nate. Happy to help. You grew your biz 23x from our help? Well done. Now we'll shoot for 50x!
RT @NateLindquist: @TheLeeMcIntyre @JamesTeale Iove you guys! Why?  I'm 23x the biz I was and 100% happier.
200,000 impressions. 2,300 clicks. 300 register for webinar. 83 attend. 3 clients. Cost $2,400. Revenues $24,000. Mathematics of marketing!
@itsallsuccess Thanks Deborah. I appreciate the comments. Yeah it was a big change with selling my business, but I'm loving every minute!
Be more productive? Check email at the end of the day, not the start. Your inbox is a list of OTHER people's priorities. Work on yours first
Who else has access to your dream prospects? Make them an irresistible offer to endorse your services. It's the fastest route to growth.
Here's another direct marketing classic for your swipes. Forward by @DraytonBird. You'd be negligent to not own this. http://t.co/HQ8Ihz5EqC
Lack of cash flow? Be creative and you can access resources to grow your business on a "performance basis". Meaning no upfront cost or risk.
@IamAdamJowett Adam agreed. It takes a strategic approach to see the truth in the numbers.
@kavitharia Thanks Kavit. It's crazy how many #entrepreneurs blindly spend a fortune on marketing they can't track. Make marketing pay.
Every $ spent on marketing should be 100% accountable. Marketing should never be an expense. Ditch anything that doesn't give a clear ROI.
@IamAdamJowett Nice to connect Adam. Yes price bumps give incremental revenue. Which is all profit since overhead and COS are already paid.
@cjouha "measurable" means more banked cash. Nothing else. And I then get paid a junior share of the increase AFTER I deliver. Never before.
RT @MariSmith: Twitter Starts Partner Audience Rollout http://t.co/tpohMOa2gL via @TwitterAds | Yay, good news!
Success as an #entrepreneur isn't from more "work". It's from more leverage. Want to make a hole? Dig very hard. Or give others a huge spade
@AustinBristow differentiation is key. Even commodity items can be packaged with superior value prop. What can you offer that others can't?
One of the easiest ways to grow ANY business is to increase your prices. Often a modest 20% jump in price can lead to a doubling of profits.
Better marketing "tactics" will only get you so far. If you want to grow your business 10x faster then zoom out + re-engineer your strategy!
@StephenMonaco Hi Stephen, nice to connect. Yes 90% of my clients are in the States. Always have been. Mostly from speaking at US seminars.
Don't you think it's nuts how most consultants get paid if they deliver or not? I proudly collect my fee AFTER I create measurable results.
If you use direct mail or you're a copywriting nut (like me!) here's a classic book you'll want for your swipe files. http://t.co/WbhLofsuEr
